title: Leavebuster penealty
body:
Hello Summoner,

I had this opinion that riot could change the leavebuster countdown so that it is minimizable. Because, IDK about you other people but I think it's rather annoying that we have to wait 10-30 minutes to stare at an empty screen while a friend just messaged and we can't see it because of a leavebuster penalty so for the next long 10 minutes you have to stare at your friends name trying to think what the sms is OR here's a brilliant idea click leave que check message and wait another 10-30 mins cause you know everyone wants to do that.

I sent this to riot and they gave me a good comment back.
"Hope your having a good day. Because, I’m not just 20 minute bans But I’m not asking you to remove them. I was wondering if you could make the leavebuster message minimizable. Because, I’m sitting all by myself and I can’t do anything for another 20 minutes and I just wanna talk to my friends but the message is in the way so please make it minimizable."
(no that's what I sent not what they sent to me)

I will admit I do AFK a lil bit and I can't help i t with my internet but that's getting fixed soon so can't complain. Because its my fault.
But, my last bans were because dad kicked me off good com and put me on my laptop then I said 'brb 3-5 mins' but everyone ff expect my duo partner. (norms not ranked) and I copped the bans. But you know s**t happens so can't complain.

I think, the leavebuster should cost 100 IP to clear one leavebuster! Or you can at least lose all the ip you receive for the next five games or another strategy like that! I don't believe waiting 20 minutes leaves a good example and community feedback for Lol.  For one, people just watch youtube and forget about it! It's so dumb! {{item:3157}}

The idea that it would cost 100ip to remove 1 'pre ban' is awesome but higher ELO's with 1million IP and probably more just makes then lose IP they can't spend anyway. So they could troll and not get punished.
And at least can we visit the store or rune page{{item:2043}}  with the message bar open when we wait?
What I'm saying here in this post is that when the message is up we can minimize it so where not staring at a 10-30 minute wait time bar not being able to do anything.
Basically what I'm trying to say is that it should be possible to minimize the leavebuster message/wait timer.
